Package com.mysema.query.grammar

Contains basic Querydsl grammar elements

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HqlOps.HqlPathType The Interface HqlPathType.
HqlOps.OpHql The Interface OpHql.
HqlOps.OpQuant The Interface OpQuant.
Ops Ops provides the operators for the fluent query grammar.
Ops.OpDateTime Date and time operators
Ops.OpMath Math operators
Ops.OpNumberAgg Aggreate operators
Ops.OpString String operators
 

Class Summary
Dialect Dialect provides different SQL dialects for querydsl-sql.
FilteredJavaSerializer FilteredJavaSerializer provides
Grammar Grammar provides the factory methods for the fluent grammar.
GrammarWithAlias GrammarWithAlias extends the base grammar to include alias factory methods
HqlGrammar HqlGrammar extends the Query DSL base grammar to provide HQL specific syntax elements.
HqlOps HqlOps extends OperationPatterns to provide operator patterns for HQL serialization
HqlQueryBase<SubType extends HqlQueryBase<SubType>> HqlQueryBase is a base Query class for HQL
HqlSerializer HqlSerializer serializes querydsl expressions into HQL syntax.
JavaOps JavaOps extends OperationPatterns to add Java syntax specific operation templates.
JavaSerializer JavaSerializer is a Serializer implementation for the Java language
Ops.Op<RT> The Class Op.
OracleDialect OracleDialect provides
OracleGrammar OracleGrammar provides Oracle specific extensions to the SqlGrammar
OracleSerializer OracleSerializer extended the SqlSerializer to support Oracle specific constructs
OrderSpecifier<A extends Comparable<? super A>> OrderSpecifier represents an order by element in a Query instance
QDateTime QDateTime provides date and time functions
QMath QMath provides math functions
QString QString provides string functions
SqlGrammar SqlGrammar provides SQL specific extensions to the general Querydsl Grammar
SqlOps SqlOps extended OperationPatterns to provided SQL specific extensions and acts as database specific Dialect for Querydsl SQL
SqlSerializer SqlSerializer serializes Querydsl queries into SQL
 

Enum Summary
HqlJoinMeta HqlJoinMeta provides join metadata in the form of flags for HQL queries
Order Order represents ascending and descending order
SqlJoinMeta SqlJoinMeta provides Sql specific join metadata in the form of enumerated flags
 

Package com.mysema.query.grammar Description

Contains basic Querydsl grammar elements
